tool_description: Money Live API gives you relevant topics about money, cost of living, and financial opportunities.
name: Money Live
title: Money Live

api_list.name: Get Individual Money News Source
api_list.description: Gets News about Money, Finance, prices, costs about recent trends in the market from a **specific news source**.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://money-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "money-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://money-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "money-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Money related News from world's top sources
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return relevant news about Money, Finance, and topics such as prices and cost of what matters in the market.

Get updated with the current information from all over the world.
api_list.code:

url = "https://money-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "money-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
